projects.title: Portable Solar Cooker (Final Year Project)
projects.description: Designed and fabricated a portable solar cooker to provide a renewable and eco-friendly alternative for off-grid cooking.
projects.detailedDescription: Designed and fabricated a portable solar cooker to provide a renewable and eco-friendly alternative for off-grid cooking. The system focused on maximizing solar energy utilization, portability, and efficiency while maintaining affordability for rural households.
projects.impact: Experimentally validated performance against conventional methods
challenges: Maintaining cooking efficiency under varying solar conditions
Reducing heat losses to improve performance
solutions: Optimized parabolic reflector and absorber plate design through CAD and CFD simulations
Selected lightweight yet durable materials for structure
Added thermal insulation to minimize energy loss
Experimentally validated performance compared to conventional cooking methods

projects.title: Automated Solid Waste Compacting & Packing Machine
projects.description: Developed a vertical hydraulic compactor integrated with an automatic stripping and binding mechanism to reduce waste volume and improve handling efficiency.
projects.detailedDescription: Developed a vertical hydraulic compactor integrated with an automatic stripping and binding mechanism to reduce waste volume and improve handling efficiency.
projects.impact: Improved waste handling efficiency by over 60%
challenges: Reducing waste volume significantly without material rebound
Synchronizing compaction, stripping, and binding processes
Ensuring operator safety and ease of use
solutions: Designed a vertical hydraulic press system for compacting
Developed automated binding and stripping mechanism for packaging
Integrated safety guards and emergency shutoff controls

projects.title: Redesign of Solid Salt Feeding Screw
projects.description: Optimized a screw conveyor mechanism for a fluidized salt tank to improve feeding efficiency and minimize wear.
projects.detailedDescription: Optimized a screw conveyor mechanism for a fluidized salt tank to improve feeding efficiency and minimize wear.
projects.impact: Improved efficiency and reduced mechanical wear
challenges: Irregular flow of granular salt particles
solutions: Modified screw pitch and diameter for smoother flow
Selected wear-resistant material coating for longer lifespan
Improved shaft alignment to reduce mechanical stress

projects.title: R-Pin Detector for Conveyor Line
projects.description: Developed a sensor-based system to detect missing R-pins in conveyor lines, ensuring higher quality assurance and reducing defects in production.
projects.detailedDescription: Developed a sensor-based system to detect missing R-pins in conveyor lines, ensuring higher quality assurance and reducing defects in production.
projects.impact: Improved quality assurance and defect reduction
challenges: Detecting small missing components at high conveyor speed
solutions: Installed proximity and optical sensors for real-time monitoring
Linked system to PLC for automated alerts
Designed modular integration for existing conveyor layouts

projects.title: Modified Pneumatic Distribution System
projects.description: Designed and fabricated an improved pneumatic distribution system to enhance reliability and energy efficiency in an industrial setup.
projects.detailedDescription: Designed and fabricated an improved pneumatic distribution system to enhance reliability and energy efficiency in an industrial setup.
challenges: Pressure losses in long pneumatic lines
Energy inefficiency from leaks and poor routing
solutions: Optimized line routing and manifold placement using CAD layouts
Used high-quality seals to minimize leaks
Standardized quick-connect fittings for easier maintenance

projects.title: Water & Dust Resistant Electrical Panel
projects.description: Collaborated in the design and fabrication of an IP-rated electrical panel for safe and reliable industrial operations.
projects.detailedDescription: Collaborated in the design and fabrication of an IP-rated electrical panel for safe and reliable industrial operations.
projects.impact: Ensured safe and reliable operations in harsh environments
challenges: Protecting sensitive components from harsh environments
solutions: Designed sealed enclosures with gaskets and filters
Used corrosion-resistant materials
Tested for water and dust ingress to meet IP rating requirements

projects.title: Automated Staircase Light System
projects.description: Designed a sensor-controlled lighting system to improve energy efficiency in buildings by activating lights only when required.
projects.detailedDescription: Designed a sensor-controlled lighting system to improve energy efficiency in buildings by activating lights only when required.
solutions: Integrated PIR motion sensors with microcontroller logic
Automatic switch-off after preset delay
Designed compact, modular system for retrofit applications

projects.title: Smart Traffic Control Machine with Image Processing
projects.description: Developed a vision-based traffic light control prototype to optimize urban traffic flow and reduce congestion.
projects.detailedDescription: Developed a vision-based traffic light control prototype to optimize urban traffic flow and reduce congestion.
projects.impact: Optimized urban traffic flow in a prototype system
challenges: Real-time vehicle detection under varying light/weather
solutions: Implemented image recognition for vehicle counting
Adjusted traffic signal cycles dynamically based on traffic density
Designed modular hardware for integration with existing systems

projects.title: Centrifugal Casting Machine
projects.description: Designed and fabricated a centrifugal casting machine to produce cylindrical castings with improved uniformity and material strength.
projects.detailedDescription: Designed and fabricated a centrifugal casting machine to produce cylindrical castings with improved uniformity and material strength.
projects.impact: Improved uniformity and material strength of castings
solutions: Designed high-strength rotating drum with secure locking
Optimized mold design to minimize defects
Implemented cooling system for improved solidification

projects.title: Automated Coffee Roasting Machine
projects.description: Developed an automated coffee roasting machine with temperature and motion control to ensure consistent roasting quality.
projects.detailedDescription: Developed an automated coffee roasting machine with temperature and motion control to ensure consistent roasting quality.
projects.impact: Ensured consistent roasting quality through automation
challenges: Maintaining precise temperature control throughout roasting
Automation of roasting and cooling cycles
solutions: Integrated thermocouples with control system for real-time feedback
Designed rotating drum for even roasting
Added automated cooling stage to preserve flavor

projects.title: Motion Analysis of a Dragon Body
projects.description: Conducted kinematic and dynamic motion analysis of a dragon-inspired body structure using CAD and simulation tools.
projects.detailedDescription: Conducted kinematic and dynamic motion analysis of a dragon-inspired body structure using CAD and simulation tools.
projects.impact: Optimized body dynamics for smooth and stable motion
solutions: Created CAD model with multiple linkages
Simulated motion sequences using SolidWorks Motion and ANSYS
Optimized body dynamics for smooth and stable motion

projects.title: Low-Noise Smart Grass Cutting Machine
projects.description: Designed a noise-reduced, eco-friendly automated grass cutting machine with improved performance and energy efficiency.
projects.detailedDescription: Designed a noise-reduced, eco-friendly automated grass cutting machine with improved performance and energy efficiency.
projects.impact: Reduced noise levels without compromising cutting power
challenges: Reducing noise levels without compromising cutting power
solutions: Developed blade housing with sound-dampening design
Integrated automated navigation controls
Used lightweight alloys to reduce vibration and noise
